verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Al-tashheth. A Psalm of David. Michtam; when he fled from Saul, in the cave. Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto <S%H430>me<s%>, O God, be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto <S%H5315>me<s%>; For my soul taketh <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in <S%H6738>thee<s%>: Yea, in the shadow of thy <S%H3671>wings<s%> will I take <S%H2620>refuge<s%>, Until these <S%H1942>calamities<s%> be <S%H5674>overpast<s%>.
I will <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> Most <S%H5945>High<s%>, Unto <S%H410>God<s%> that performeth all things for <S%H1584>me<s%>.

He will <S%H7971>send<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H7602>me<s%>, When he that would swallow me up <S%H2778>reproacheth<s%>; <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah <S%H430>God<s%> will send <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and his <S%H571>truth<s%>.

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3833>lions<s%>; I <S%H7901>lie<s%> among them that are set on <S%H3857>fire<s%>, Even the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, whose <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are <S%H2595>spears<s%> and <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, And their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>.
Be thou <S%H7311>exalted<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, above the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; Let thy <S%H3519>glory<s%> be above all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

They have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> a <S%H7568>net<s%> for my <S%H6471>steps<s%>; My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is bowed <S%H3721>down<s%>: They have <S%H3738>digged<s%> a <S%H7882>pit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5307>me<s%>; They are fallen into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof <S%H5542>themselves<s%>. [[Selah
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>fixed<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>fixed<s%>: I will <S%H7891>sing<s%>, <S%H2167>yea<s%>, I will sing praises.
Awake <S%H5782>up<s%>, my <S%H3519>glory<s%>; <S%H5782>Awake<s%>, <S%H5035>psaltery<s%> and <S%H3658>harp<s%>: I myself will <S%H5782>awake<s%> right <S%H7837>early<s%>.
I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H136>thee<s%>, O Lord, among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>: I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> praises unto thee among the <S%H3816>nations<s%>.
For thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> unto the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, And thy <S%H571>truth<s%> unto the <S%H7834>skies<s%>.
Be thou <S%H7311>exalted<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, above the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; Let thy <S%H3519>glory<s%> be above all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
